metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15682 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: RDesktop version 1.8.4 contains multiple out-of-bound access readvulnerabilities in its code, which results in a denial of service (DoS)condition. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.These issues have been fixed in version 1.8.5

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
